com.communote.server.core.mail.messages

Class TextMailMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.communote.server.core.mail.messages.MailMessage
      • com.communote.server.core.mail.messages.TextMailMessage

  • public class TextMailMessage
extends MailMessage
    Mail message, which allows to set the subject and content of the mail directly.
    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/

        subject - The subject.
        content - The content.

        fromEmailAddress - The senders email address. Might be null.
        fromName - The senders name. Might be null.

    • Method Detail

      • prepareModel

        public void prepareModel(Map<String,Object> model)
        Description copied from class: MailMessage
        Prepare a model of key-value pairs which will be passed to the template engine when the content and subject templates should be rendered.
        Specified by:
        prepareModel in class MailMessage
        Parameters:
        model - The model to prepare. It will be initialized with the settings returned by MailMessage.getGlobalModel().
